## Title :pushpin:
A title for technical debt

## Age :skull:

- [ ] CREATED NOW

## Description :clipboard:
A clear and concise description of what the tech debt is and the reason of being created


## Impact :bomb:
Description of the current or possible impact of this tech debt.
